article_title: 257,000 Doctors Will Get Medicare Pay Cut For Using Paper Records

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: More than 250,000 physicians and other health professionals are being notified as early as today that their payments from Medicare and Medicaid will be cut because they aren’t adequately using electronic health records in their practices, the Obama administration confirmed. The Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services, known as CMS, is [...]
